Others: The New Orleans Pelicans vs. LA Clippers game will be played on Monday, Dec. 30 at 7:00 pm CT at the Smoothie King Center.
The game will be broadcast on Gulf Coast Sports & Entertainment Network for Pelicans fans, and FanDuel Sports Network - SoCal for Clippers fans.
The Pelicans hold a 43-32 head-to-head record against the LA Clippers over 75 regular season games.
The article provides the game schedule for both teams in the days following the match.
